work.summary: Engineered ETL pipelines using Azure Data Factory for an in-house data migration tool (Ultrasonic), handling 10M+ row datasets across diverse source/target systems. Partnered with marketing stakeholders to build a Snowflake-based analytics framework; integrated advanced stored procedures with Power BI dashboards to internalize campaign KPI tracking, eliminating >$2M in outsourcing costs. Shipped CI/CD pipelines to automate SQL script deployments, reducing manual effort by ~60 hours/month.

Built analytical dashboards to track merchant onboarding and financial KPIs; identified bottlenecks that reduced drop-offs by 40%. Developed an OCR pipeline to extract/validate merchant document numbers with 97% accuracy (Google Vision + OpenCV), removing manual entry; deployed via AWS Lambda and Amazon EFS. Created a RAG-based conversational agent (LangChain + Milvus) to automate customer query resolution via agent–tool workflows.

portfolio.name: Fine-Tuning Llama 3.2–3B on IPCC Climate Reports
portfolio.description: Applied 4-bit quantization, BF16, and LoRA (r=8, α=32) with gradient checkpointing; reduced trainable parameters to ~2.3M (~0.07%) and enabled micro-batch size 32 on a single A100. Orchestrated data/tensor/pipeline parallelism across 2×A100s; doubled throughput (337→169 min) and cut per-GPU memory up to ~48%. Packaged modular Trainer scripts and SLURM workflows to automate QLoRA (pplx 7.996) and multi-GPU runs (pplx 14.36–22.97).

portfolio.name: MOT-TR — Fine-Tuning DETR for Moved-Object Detection
portfolio.description: Built end-to-end pipeline to fine-tune DETR for detecting moved objects in image pairs (scene-change analysis for traffic surveillance). Reduced eval loss from 2.38 to 0.60 via staged training, transfer learning, and cosine LR scheduling; stabilized convergence on small custom datasets. Achieved reproducible experiments with automated logging, checkpointing, and visualization.

portfolio.name: Limit Order Book Midpoint Prediction for Crypto
portfolio.description: Transformed bid/ask distance percentages into prices, computed Order Flow Imbalance at 5/10 depths, and structured normalized 100-record windows. Benchmarked KNN, SVR, MLP, LSTM, CNN+LSTM, CNN+SVR, and a custom neural-SVR with dynamically scaled ε-insensitive loss and trend-alignment penalty; evaluated with MSE and R². Delivered state-of-the-art results with custom-loss neural-SVR (MSE 28.05; R² 0.998); improved trend interpretability via OFI features.

portfolio.name: OS Simulation Suite
portfolio.description: Implemented paging system parsing per-process VMAs and memory-access traces; enforced FIFO/Random/Clock/Aging/Working-Set; produced per-reference logs and end-to-end cost summaries. Built a discrete-event disk scheduler (FIFO, SSTF, LOOK, C-LOOK, FLOOK); modeled head motion at 1 track/time-unit; logged arrival/start/end times and computed movement, utilization, turnaround, and wait stats. Developed an event-driven process-lifecycle simulator with FCFS, SJF/SRTF, Round-Robin, Priority; generated per-process metrics and overall utilization reports.
